hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1e9ce44fa21dd9dea4dc5ab8d7df2c44da8af35f)

$247=\purpleD{2}\text{ hundreds} + \blueE{4}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{7}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD2\text{ hundreds} = \blueE{20}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/17e5d296bd84eb744f6f3c25583467f73ae0eff0)

$\blueE{20}\text{ tens} + \blueE4\text{ tens} +\maroonD7\text{ ones}= \blueE{24}\text{ tens}+\maroonD7\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{24}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{240}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f53934eafb21c76b6ff14da667aeaac22a6fe69c)

$\maroonD{240}\text{ ones} + \maroonD7\text{ ones} = \maroonD{247}\text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Complete the equations.**

 |  | |  | | | | |
-: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: 
$247 =$|$2$ |$\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$| $4$ | $\text{ tens}$ | $+$ | $7$ |$\text{ ones}$
$247=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 1]] | $\text{tens}$ |$+$ | $7$ | $\text{ ones}$
$247=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | $0$| $\text{ tens}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 2]] | $\text{ones}$
